_meanings:
{@--4@} The dark portion in the
disc of the moon.

<ab>N.</ab> of a
celebrated drama by Kālidāsa in
seven acts, in which king Duṣyanta
marries Kaṇva's daughter 
Śakuntalā by the Gāndharva form of 
marriage, forgets all about her owing
to the curse of Durvāsas, but 
ultimately recollects, at the sight of
the token-ring ({#aBijYAna#}) that he
had duly married her; {#aBijYAnena#} 
{#smftA SakuMtalA aBijYAnaSakuMtalA; tAmaDikftya kftaM#}
{#nAwakaM °SakuMtalaM#}; (the reading {#°SAkuMtalaM#}
is grammatically indefensible).
